comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
Package the Korporus shell and its hosted apps into a Docker container and deploy it to AWS App Runner. Set up the Amplify demo apps to point at the App Runner URL. Validate the full end-to-end flow: user hits an Amplify demo URL → browser loads the SPA from CDN → SPA fetches federated modules from App Runner (waking the container if scaled to zero) → app renders.

### Depends on
- Epic 2 and Epic 3 (shell + toy app working locally)

### Children
- Task 5.1: Dockerfile for the Korporus container (after Epics 2 and 3)
- Task 5.2: Deploy Korporus container to AWS App Runner (after 5.1)
- Task 5.3: Deploy demo apps to Amplify Gen2 (after 5.2)
- Task 5.4: End-to-end smoke test of the full deployment (after 5.2 and 5.3)
